attributes.action: establish with immediate effect a new government department, the Department of Boombast, and appoint the Most Blessed Lord of Boombast, Shaggy, as Minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Additionally, we would like to see the Prime Minister perform a slamming rendition of 'Oh Carolina!' live with Shaggy himself at Number Ten, although this will be left at his discretion.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
